title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Wednesday, 11 May 2016 - BBC News
summary: m11 closed after 40 tonnes of wood catch fire on lorry .
police continue to question a man over a fatal fire in westcliff-on-sea .
man left with life-changing injuries after being 'shot while sat in a van ' in stanford-le-hope .
more than 600 people from essex are on the run after skipping bail .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's it from us at essex live today - thanks for stopping by .
we 'll be back from 08:00 tomorrow with the latest news for the county .
have a great evening .

documents.title: dumped trolleys , bicycles and a motorbike pulled from the river chelmer
text: six shopping trolleys , eight bicycles and a motorbike were just some of the items dragged from the river chelmer during a recent clean-up operation .
chelmsford city council required a winch to pull some of the more bulkier items out of the water on friday .
tools and other smaller items were also recovered .

documents.title: weather : showers easing to leave a dry night
text: any isolated showers will quickly ease through this evening , leaving the night largely dry with clear spells .
however , we may have the odd shower passing westwards during the early hours .
minimum temperature : 12c ( 54f ) .
tomorrow will be a mainly dry day across essex , with some good sunny spells , especially through the afternoon .
stay up-to-date with the latest forecast here .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: in the news : westcliff flat fire victim named hurst leaves southend united
text: if you 're just joining us , here are the top stories for essex :
author: Ian Puckey
BBC Essex

documents.title: rolling road block under way as one m11 lane reopens
text: a rolling road block is under way on the northbound m11 , between j7 and j8 , to allow for a closure to be lifted .
one lane will remain closed into this evening while repair work takes place following an earlier lorry fire .
you can find regular travel updates here .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: flat fire victim died from 'inhalation of fire fumes '
text: an expectant mother who died following a flat fire in westcliff-on-sea on saturday has been named as khabi abrey .
a post-mortem examination says the 30-year-old died from complications arising following the inhalation of fire fumes .
her unborn baby died of cardiac arrest due to mrs abrey 's inhalation of fire fumes .
a 47-year-old man from westcliff arrested as part of the force 's murder investigation remains in custody .

documents.title: breakingwestcliff flat fire victim named
text: essex police has named an expectant mother who died following a flat fire in westcliff as khabi abrey .
more to follow .

documents.title: world 's biggest pumpkin : essex man seeds title hopes
text: the uk is a hotbed for world-beating vegetable whoppers , but has never held the prestigious title of the planet 's plumpest pumpkin .
that could be about to change thanks to michael oliver , from essex , who has sown a very special seed .
it was bought at auction for a record-breaking £ 1,250 from suffolk-based thompson and morgan .
the seed came from the world 's current title-holding pumpkin , which tipped the scales at 165 stone ( 1,048kg ) .

documents.title: m11 trapped traffic now released
text: traffic trapped on the northbound m11 at j8 after a lorry fire has now been released , police say .
recovery of the vehicle , which caught on fire at about 11:00 , is now under way .
there are no reports of any injuries .
it 's hoped one lane will open to traffic shortly .
updates as we get them .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: forensic team remains on site of stanford-le-hope shooting
text: a forensic team is continuing its work at the site of last night 's shooting in stanford-le-hope .
here 's what we know so far :
author: Chris Flynn
BBC Essex

documents.title: m11 clarification : lorry wood was n't part of fire
text: contrary to earlier reports , 40 tonnes of wood that was being towed by a lorry which caught on fire on the m11 was not part of the blaze .
we believe the trailer was detached from the cab before the fire could spread .

documents.title: ambulance service was not called to m11 lorry fire
text: the east of england ambulance service has told me it did not attend today 's lorry fire on the m11 .
there are not reports of any injuries .
the road remains closed .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: kevan hurst leaves southend united
text: news just in , kevan hurst has left southend united .
the midfielder was released today as he was not offered a new contract by the club .
he spent four years with the blues and was a major part of their league two play-off win last season .
author: Glenn Speller
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: weather : outbreaks of rain expected throughout the afternoon
text: it will remain humid during this afternoon , with outbreaks of rain at times .
these showers could possibly be heavy and thundery .
maximum temperature : 20c ( 68f ) .
you can stay up-to-date with the latest forecast here .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: engineers to assess damage on m11 once trapped traffic has been released
text: adam pipe from essex police tells me highways england will assess the state of the 200 litre diesel spill once trapped traffic has been released .
a coconut matting has been placed on the floor to soak up the spillage and `` it seems to be working '' , said mr pipe , who works as casualty reduction manager .
he said people who have been stuck should now return to their cars as it 's likely they will be moving shortly .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: essex police : trapped traffic now moving - m11 northbound j8 remains closed
text: # m11 hgv fire nb trapped traffic now moving past scene .
j8 remains closed .
@ twitterid @ twitterid
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid there are people who work @ twitterid that are not in the same departments that need arresting

documents.title: 'no word ' if m11 will need resurfacing
text: i have just spoken to our travel reporter barry lewis about the northbound m11 closure at j8 .
he said : `` we 've had no word as to whether it will need resurfacing .
there is a lot of trapped traffic up towards the closure and a queue for a few miles northbound on the m11 , and on the a120 around birchanger there 's heavy traffic . ''
`` also slow towards the motorway from stansted . ''
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: m11 major clean-up operation continues
text: there 's quite a clean-up operation under way on the northbound m11 .
not only did a lorry pulling 40 tonnes of wood catch fire just after 11:00 - it spilled its diesel on to the carriageway too .
essex police says it hopes to open a lane for trapped traffic soon .

documents.title: m11 northbound diversion in place
text: as police try to clear trapped traffic on the m11 northbound a diversion is in place for motorists in the area .
drivers are advised to follow the circle symbols through the a120 , a10 and the a505 .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police try to clear stuck m11 traffic
text: essex police says it is working to clear traffic stuck because of the m11 northbound closure .
it says it has about four miles of traffic to clear , as both lanes remain closed between j8 at bishops stortford and j9 for saffron walden .
you can find regular travel updates here .

documents.title: essex police : do not block m11 hard shoulder
text: # m11 do not block hard shoulder north bound j8 .
we are trying to get additional emergency vehicles to scene of incident .
@ twitterid
@ twitterid @ twitterid pls any news how long we will be stuck in n/b m11 .
any help ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid turn around of traffic well underway .
approx 4 miles of trapped traffic .
scene still closed unfortunately
@ twitterid @ twitterid thx we are betwixt ugley and ugley green any idea how long ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid susie - still significant trapped traffic .
we may however be able to open lane 2 very shortly & i will let you know .
@ twitterid @ twitterid we 're free !
thanks a lot !
@ twitterid @ twitterid thank you .
sorry for any inconvenience

documents.title: m11 still closed after lorry catches fire and spills diesel
text: the northbound m11 remains closed after a lorry pulling 40 tonnes of wood caught fire between bishops stortford and saffron walden earlier .

station officer paul curtis , of saffron walden fire station , said : `` the quick actions of the driver prevented the fire from spreading further , which also prevented a lengthy motorway closure . ''

documents.title: stanford-le-hope shooting cordon remains in place
text: a cordon remains in place in stanford-le-hope this lunchtime after a man was shot in his van here yesterday .
the victim suffered life-changing injuries after he was shot in london road at about 19:00 .
no arrests have been made .
author: Chris Flynn
BBC Essex

documents.title: on-the-run conman from colchester traced to spain
text: a serial conman wanted by police in essex and norfolk for a £ 21,000 fraud in the uk is being held in a spanish jail .
norman fowler went missing in 2014 after being sentenced to nine months in jail at norwich crown court .
the 38-year-old , from colchester , later moved to alicante , where he is being held in custody while on remand for unrelated gun licensing matters .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC News

documents.title: money raised 'to thank ' james fairweather tip-off woman
text: a crowdfunding page has been set up to raise money for a woman who missed out on a £ 20,000 reward , despite tipping off police about a double murderer .
michelle sadler was told she was not eligible to receive crimestoppers money after she told police james fairweather was hiding in bushes in colchester .
as first reported in the colchester gazette , crimestoppers said rewards were only given to people who rang its number rather than the police .
fairweather was given two life sentences for the murders in april .
megan rowley , who set up the justgiving page , said she wanted to `` give people the chance to thank '' mrs sadler .
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: in the news : lorry fire closes northbound m11 money raised 'to thank ' james fairweather tip-off woman
text: here are the latest stories for essex this lunchtime :
author: Sonia Watson
BBC Essex

documents.title: diesel spill after lorry fire causes further delays on northbound m11
text: essex police says it is assisting highways england in dealing with a diesel spillage on the northbound m11 .
the road is currently blocked northbound , between j8 at bishops stortford and j9 for saffron walden .

documents.title: essex 'most wanted ' skipped bail in november
text: one of essex police 's `` most wanted '' skipped court bail in november .
tony price , 23 , whose last known address was in maldon , features on the force 's 'wanted ' page .
he is among 646 people on the run having failed to appear at court in the essex area .

documents.title: rodney bass : new m11 junction at harlow essential
text: plans to build a new m11 junction at harlow are `` essential '' to provide homes and jobs , according to the councillor responsible for infrastructure at essex county council .
plans for junction 7a were unveiled by the authority this morning .
do you live in harlow ?
what do you make of plans to create an extra m11 junction in your town ?
send us an email , tweet or visit our facebook page .

documents.title: nick alston describes pcc job as a 'privilege '
text: nick alston , the outgoing police and crime commissioner for essex , has described his time in the role as a `` privilege '' .
he will be replaced by fellow conservative roger hirst , who was elected last week .
mr alston appeared on the bbc 's victoria derbyshire programme .

documents.title: travel : lorry fire causes delays on northbound m11
text: a lorry fire is causing delays on the northbound m11 between j8 at bishops stortford and j9 for saffron walden .
the road is currently blocked .
# m11 n/b btwn j8 - j9 is blocked due to an hgv fire .
please be patient we 'll get you moving asap

documents.title: plans to create new harlow m11 junction unveiled
text: plans to create a new m11 junction at harlow have been unveiled today .
essex county council is planning to create junction 7a in a bid to improve congestion and access to the west essex town .
the consultation will run until 6 july .
if you 'd like to see the proposals , they will be on display at a series of public exhibitions along the gilden way/sheering road route .

documents.title: cricket : aaron beard on coming through the ranks to essex
text: essex 's aaron beard says coming through the ranks in club cricket has been a major part in his career .
the teenager made his first-class debut for essex this week , taking five wickets in the tour match against sri lanka .
beard , who started playing at writtle before joining chelmsford , said : `` it 's a great place to be with a great bunch of lads who help you all the time . ''
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex sport

documents.title: 'happy retirement ' police chief pays tribute to essex pcc on his last day
text: today is nick alston 's last day as the police and crime commissioner for essex , and the chief constable of the force has taken to social media to pay tribute to him .
stephen kavanagh tweeted mr alston `` held me to account during the most difficult time for policing in generations '' .
adding , he `` has put in place better solutions that have helped victims '' .
mr alston will be replaced by newly-elected conservative roger hirst following last week 's election .
on @ twitterid last day in post i 'd like to pay tribute to his service in keeping essex safe .

documents.title: police still searching suspect who skipped bail in 1998
text: essex police is still searching for a suspected criminal who skipped bail in 1998 .
the details were revealed as part of a series of freedom of information requests , which found there were more than 600 outstanding warrants in essex .
the warrant from 1998 related to a burglary offence .

documents.title: double-murder accused brett rogers claims 'mystery man ' responsible for killings
text: a man accused of the murder of his mother and her friend has claimed they were fatally stabbed by a mystery stranger while he was at the shops .
brett rogers , 23 , from stansted mountfitchet , denies murdering gillian phillips , 54 , and david oakes , 60 , at ms phillips 's home in the village .
he told chelmsford crown court the pair were attacked while he was at the supermarket for five minutes last july .
the trial continues today .

documents.title: more than 600 people from essex on the run after skipping bail
text: more than 600 people from essex who skipped bail while facing , or having been convicted of , charges including arson and sexual assault are on the run , a bbc investigation has found .
they are among over 13,000 suspected and convicted criminals subject to outstanding arrest warrants in england .
in total , 646 warrants are outstanding in the county , while 1,340 out of 1,574 issued were successfully executed last year .

documents.title: man continues to be questioned over westcliff fatal flat fire
text: police are continuing to question a man on sus of murder after a fatal fire in westcliff-on-sea , which claimed the lives of a woman and her unborn baby .
the blaze happened on the ninth floor at a block of flats in balmoral road on saturday evening .
officers are trying to establish if the fire was a targeted attack .
det ch insp marina ericson said : `` this is an important development in our inquiries but this is very much a continuing investigation . ''

documents.title: police appeal for witnesses in stanford-le-hope shooting
text: police are appealing for anybody who witnessed a shooting in stanford-le-hope last night to come forward .
a man in his 50s suffered life-changing injuries when he was shot while sitting in his van in london road , at about 19:00 .
the road remains cordoned off .

det insp al pitcher said : `` at this time of night there would have been a lot of people , including motorists heading home , in this area and we would appeal for anyone who saw what happened to get in touch . ''

documents.title: stanford-le-hope road cordoned off after shooting
text: london road in stanford-le-hope remains closed this morning after a shooting last night .
essex police says the motive for the attack , which happened at about 19:00 , has not been established , but there appears to be `` no threat '' to the wider public .
it 's thought the road will be closed all morning while forensic investigations continue .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man suffers life-changing injuries in stanford-le-hope shooting
text: a man has suffered life-changing injuries in a shooting in stanford-le-hope , police say .
the victim , believed to be in his 50s , was shot while sat in his van at the junction of london road and stanford road , at about 19:00 last night .
the suspect is reported to have been driving a silver mercedes c-class , which drove off at speed after the attack .

documents.title: weather : murky and humid with outbreaks of rain and showers in places
text: it 's a misty and murky start to the day for many of us , with showers developing later .
maximum temperature : 20c ( 68f ) .
get the latest forecast from bbc weather .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: in the news : man shot in stanford-le-hope police question man over westcliff fatal fire
text: good morning - here are the top stories from essex :
author: Sonia Watson
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to essex live
text: good morning and welcome to essex live .
join us until 18:00 for the latest news across the county .
if you 'd like to get in touch you can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
